attributes.action: Create a box on the ballot paper at the next general election - " None of the above "
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When we vote we either can put a cross alongside our chosen candidate or make the ballot paper void. 
A box to cross should be available saying - " None of the above "
This would enable politicians to see that we are not happy with any of the
indaquate candidates put forward for us to vote for.
